version_description:
- Fixed memory leak issue.
- Added feature to share Wayback Machine URLs of archives
- Added the instruction video.

- Changed font size and color of buttons
- Added WBM logo in home screen
- Displayed correct error message when error occurred in "First Version" and "Second Version"
- UI updated
- Fixed minor issues.
- Updated UI
- Minor issue fixed in Help screen

- Added Calendar View for all archives.
- Minor UI updates.
- Fixed app crash issue.
- Fixed some issues in profile page
- Displayed error message when a URL is blocked by site's robots.txt
Now supports authenticated sessions with archive.org
- Minor issue fixed

- add video and photo uploading capability to library
- fix UI in login process
- fix app crash issue when upload large video file

- Ability to add to My Web Archive
- Bug fix

- Added Login/SignUp flow as a required option
- Used SPN2(updated save page now API) to archive URL
- UI updates
Added ability to request help without archive.org account.

- fix navigation bar height in iPhone X
- fix an issue in adding to my web archive
- remove white space in splash screen(launch screen)
- fix calendar view layout so it works for any iOS device.
Fixed a bug when password changed
We fixed the crashing and login bugs so you can enjoy using the app again!
This fixes a login bug while using the Safari Share Extension, and corrects some text color while using Dark Mode.
Fixes a login bug so that you can archive using the Share extension, and improved progress alert.
